thread.title: Wedding Show at County Hall (Wiltshire Council)
thread.title_full: Wedding Show at County Hall (Wiltshire Council) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Wedding Show at County Hall (Wiltshire Council)
text: (Source: Wiltshire Council) Couples will have plenty of help to plan their big day when County Hall in Trowbridge hosts a wedding show this month. There will be goody bags for the first 100 brides, a catwalk show, photo booth and exhibitors offering help and suggestions at the event on 18 October from 11am to 4pm. Visitors can also have the chance to tour County Hall's own ceremony rooms and see a mock ceremony taking place. There will be two opportunities to win a free ceremony either at County Hall or Pythouse Park in Tisbury subject to terms and conditions. Stuart Wheeler, cabinet member for arts and heritage said: 'Planning your wedding is one of the most important things you do. We want couples to come along and enjoy the fun interactive events while picking up lots of useful information which will help make it easier to arrange their big day.' distributed by This content was issued by Wiltshire Council on the 2015-10-07 and was initially posted on www.wiltshire.gov.uk. It was distributed, unedited and unaltered, by noodls on 2015-10-08 10:49:14 UTC. The original issuer is solely responsible for the accuracy of the information contained therein. (noodl: 30236304)
